title: Avast blocking League 24/3/2016
body:
Hi is any one else having issues logging into league with avast? I have two computers down due to the avast bug. The lol files that need to be added to its exclusions are added. I have restarted computer and even disabled avast to try it and nothing works for League now. If I can avoid re downloading the game and patching I will but if not its meh for me for the night I guess for league.

Any help would be appreciated

replies.body:
I had the same problem until 15 minutes ago,
Here's how to fix it.

1. Go to your Riot Games Folder
2. Go to League of legends.
3. Then RADS.
4. Then Projects
5. Delete the folders entitled lol_patcher and lol_launcher
6. start league normally through your desktop icon.
7. wait for the short download to finish and enjoy the game.

I ended up having to do a complete re install using the Hextech repair tool to fix the issue. Doing what BeSpooks said did not fix my problem :( but thank you for the replies every one it was greatly appreciated!

Wow thankyou! I just made a post about 5 mins ago for exact same issue! :D 

Your awesome brother

Hey there,

As far as I know Avast also comes bundled with a firewall, right? If so, have you added league to your firewall exceptions as well as your antivirus exceptions?
